info.description: API для платформы Sve Tu - маркетплейс объявлений
info.title: Sve Tu Marketplace API

post.description: Creates a new attribute for categories
Creates a new marketplace category

get.description: Returns custom components for a specific category
Returns detailed information about a specific category

post.description: Links an attribute to a category with optional required setting

put.description: Updates settings for an attribute-category relationship

delete.description: Unlinks an attribute from a category

put.description: Moves a category to a different parent in the hierarchy

post.description: Changes the order of categories based on provided IDs list

parameters.description: List of category IDs in new order
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns a list of all custom UI components

post.description: Creates a new custom UI component

get.description: Returns a list of all component templates

post.description: Creates a template for a custom component

get.description: Returns a list of all component usages with filtering

post.description: Adds component usage for a specific category

delete.description: Removes component usage for a category

get.description: Gets a custom UI component by ID
Checks if user with specified email is an administrator (no authorization required)
Returns list of all system administrators

post.description: Adds a new administrator by email

get.description: Checks if user with specified email is an administrator

delete.description: Removes administrator privileges from user by email

get.description: Returns list of all category attributes sorted by sort_order and ID

put.description: Updates multiple category attributes in a single request

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific attribute

put.description: Updates an existing category attribute with new data

delete.description: Deletes a category attribute by ID

get.description: Exports all attribute settings for a specific category as JSON

post.description: Imports attribute settings into a category, replacing existing settings

parameters.description: List of attribute mappings to import
parameters.name: attributes

put.description: Updates settings for an attribute within a specific category

post.description: Links a category attribute to a specific category with optional settings

delete.description: Removes the link between a category attribute and a category

post.description: Copies all attribute settings from a source category to a target category
Alternative endpoint to reindex all marketplace listings
Reindexes all marketplace listings in the search index
Reindexes all marketplace listings with their translations in the search index
Reindexes ratings and review counts for all marketplace listings
Synchronizes discount data for all listings (Admin only)

get.description: Returns paginated list of all users in the system
Returns detailed user information by user ID

put.description: Updates user profile information by administrator

delete.description: Permanently deletes a user from the system

get.description: Returns balance information for a specific user
Returns paginated transaction history for a specific user

post.description: Authenticates user and returns JWT access token
Logs out the user by revoking all refresh tokens and clearing cookies
Refreshes expired access token using valid refresh token from cookie
Creates a new user account and returns JWT access token

get.description: Returns all attribute groups

post.description: Creates a new attribute group for organizing attributes

get.description: Returns information about a specific attribute group
Returns attribute group with all its attributes

post.description: Adds an attribute to a group

delete.description: Removes an attribute from a group

get.description: Returns attribute groups attached to a category

post.description: Attaches an attribute group to a category

delete.description: Detaches an attribute group from a category

get.description: Returns information about a specific attachment

delete.description: Deletes an attachment (only by the message sender)

get.description: Returns all marketplace categories
Returns min/max values for numeric attributes in a category
Returns all attributes available for a specific category
Returns category suggestions based on query
Returns hierarchical tree of all categories with caching
Returns all chats where the user is a participant
Returns paginated messages from a chat

post.description: Archives a chat for the user
Enhances multiple images for a marketplace listing using AI processing
Creates a preview of an enhanced image before applying changes

get.description: Returns autocomplete suggestions with categories
Returns all listings marked as favorites by the user
Returns the total number of listings in user's favorites

post.description: Adds a listing to user's favorites

delete.description: Removes a listing from user's favorites

get.description: Checks if a specific listing is in user's favorites
get.summary: Check if listing is in favorites

delete.description: Deletes an image from a marketplace listing

get.description: Returns paginated list of listings with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new marketplace listing with attributes

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific listing including attributes and images

put.description: Updates an existing marketplace listing. Only the owner can update

delete.description: Deletes a marketplace listing. Only the owner can delete

post.description: Uploads multiple images for a marketplace listing

get.description: Returns price history for a specific listing
Returns listings similar to a specific listing
Returns all listings within the specified geographical bounds
Returns clustered listings data for efficient map rendering

post.description: Sends a new message to a chat
Marks specified messages as read

parameters.description: Message IDs to mark as read
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns the number of unread messages for the user

post.description: Uploads attachments for a chat message
Checks an uploaded image for prohibited content using AI moderation

get.description: Performs advanced search with filters, facets, and suggestions
Returns autocomplete suggestions based on prefix

post.description: Translates multiple listings to the specified target language using the selected provider
Automatically detects the language of the provided text
Translates text from source language to target language using specified provider

get.description: Retrieves all translations for a specific listing, optionally filtered by language

put.description: Updates translations for a specific listing with support for different providers

get.description: Returns paginated list of reviews with filters

post.description: Creates a new review for a listing

get.description: Returns average rating for a specific entity
Returns review statistics for a specific entity
Returns detailed review statistics for a specific entity
Returns all reviews for a specific storefront
Returns rating summary for a specific storefront
Returns all reviews received by a specific user
Returns rating summary for a specific user
Returns a single review by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing review by its author

delete.description: Deletes a review by its author

post.description: Uploads photos for an existing review
Adds a response from the listing owner to a review
Adds a helpful or unhelpful vote to a review

get.description: Returns current usage limits and statistics for the translation service

post.description: Sets the default translation provider for the user

get.description: Checks if user with specified email is administrator (simplified check by ID)

post.description: Авторизует пользователя по email и паролю, создает сессию и устанавливает session cookie

parameters.description: Данные для авторизации (email и password обязательны)
parameters.name: user

get.description: Returns full profile of the authenticated user

put.description: Updates profile of the authenticated user

post.description: Создает нового пользователя в системе

parameters.description: Данные для регистрации (name, email, password обязательны, phone опционален)
parameters.name: user

get.description: Returns public information about user by ID
Redirects user to Google OAuth2 authorization page
Processes the OAuth2 callback from Google and creates user session
Returns information about the currently authenticated user

display_value.description: Вспомогательное поле для вывода значения любого типа в строковом виде

public_url.description: Публичный URL для доступа к файлу

metadata.description: Для хранения дополнительной информации, включая данные о скидке

city.description: Теперь используем обычные строки, а не указатели
